definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: The shape of falling raindrops can be approximately treated as spheroids.
sentences.chinese: 下落雨滴的形状可以近似地用旋转椭球体来处理。

sentences.english: Ben:"Since Mercury10 has crossed paths with Jupiter, your fortunes are falling."
sentences.chinese: 墨丘利神已经穿过木星的轨道，你的运气正在下落。

sentences.english: Pour countries accepted the arrest warrant, told officers and soldiers themselves know the whereabouts of the person.
sentences.chinese: 倾国接下了通缉令，告诉官兵自己知道那人的下落。

sentences.english: Falling raindrops break up through hydrodynamic effects .
sentences.chinese: 下落雨滴由于流体动力作用而破碎。

sentences.english: The police appeared to be making no progress in trailing Zac's whereabouts.
sentences.chinese: 在寻找礼物的下落上，警察似乎并没有取得什么进展。

sentences.english: He came to the scene day group, to dream XiaoWei asked the whereabouts of money.
sentences.chinese: 他来到景天集团，向梦晓薇问起资金的下落。

sentences.english: But the President was sympathetic to the plight of the leopard.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，总统对雪豹的下落还是十分关心。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Psyche's sisters started searching for her.
sentences.chinese: 一段时间后，赛琪的姐姐们开始寻找她的下落。

sentences.english: The fate of one sister, Pepi, remains unknown.
sentences.chinese: 目前仍有一个叫皮皮的姐姐下落不明。

sentences.english: After the fall of Small Swords Society Uprising, opinions vary on the whereabouts of Liu Lichuan.
sentences.chinese: 小刀会起义失败后，刘丽川的下落历来众说纷纭。

sentences.english: The publisher did not reveal Du Daozheng's whereabouts.
sentences.chinese: 出版商没有透露杜导正的下落。

sentences.english: The whereabouts of one of the ancient paintings is unknown.
sentences.chinese: 有幅古画现在下落不明。

sentences.english: They are investigating what has become of the missing ship.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直在调查那条失踪的船的下落。

sentences.english: One town, Minamisanriku, had about 10,000 people unaccounted for.
sentences.chinese: 南山陆町就有将近10000人下落不明。

sentences.english: She fell ten meters down the rock.
sentences.chinese: 她沿着那座岩石下落了十米。

sentences.english: But what about the four - and - a -half- ton treasure that is said to be on board ?
sentences.chinese: 但那笔据说在船上的四吨半宝藏的下落呢？

definition: to try to find out/to trace/to track down
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
